Note: The estimates are based on the 2010 Census and reflect changes to the April 1, 2010 population due to the Count Question Resolution program. For descriptions of the Resident Population, Resident Population Plus Armed Forces Overseas, Civilian Population, Civilian Noninstitutionalized Population, and Household Population universes, see Population Estimates Terms and Definitions at http://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/popest/about/glossary.html. For population estimates methodology statements, see http://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/popest/technical-documentation/methodology.html.
